title: What is Book ABSR? Amazon Book Sales Rank EXPLAINED
description:
Have you ever come across the term ABSR before? Confused as to what it meant? In this video, I’ll be breaking down what it is, how we can find it, and five ways why it’s beneficial for us to know it.
